verbs.description: [V: Considering] [ARG1: the rarity of President Donald Trump departing any recent summit meeting with a smile on his face] , Tuesday ’s session with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un was remarkable for

Considering the rarity of [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: departing] [ARG1: any recent summit meeting] [ARGM-MNR: with a smile on his face] , Tuesday ’s session with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un was remarkable for

[ARGM-ADV: Considering the rarity of President Donald Trump departing any recent summit meeting with a smile on his face] , [ARG1: Tuesday ’s session with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un] [V: was] [ARG2: remarkable for]
